snippet: State police have requested a federal investigation of a car chase that resulted in the deaths of two Guatemalan immigrants.
abstract: Texas state police request federal investigation of car chase in which trooper fired on fleeing pickup from helicopter, resulting in deaths of two Guatemalan immigrants hiding in truck's bed.
lead_paragraph: State police have requested a federal investigation of a car chase that resulted in the deaths of two Guatemalan immigrants.

headline.seo: Texas Investigation Into Shooting Deaths of Immigrants Expands
headline.main: Texas: Inquiry Into Immigrants’ Shooting Expands
headline.print_headline: Texas: Inquiry Into Immigrants’ Shooting Expands
